Flashlight Night Photograph of Deer

Hughes, Charles

Title
Flashlight Night Photograph of Deer
Creator
Hughes, Charles
Description
Photograph shows Flashlight, taken at night by the Deer. This was reputedly the first picture taken of an animal at night in which the animal itself triggered the camera. It was written up in severalâ€¦
